code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const toggleMenu=()=>{setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen);};const closeMenu=()=>{setIsMenuOpen(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"PoolPro Ivan"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Cathedral City Pool Services"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav ".concat(isMenuOpen?'nav-open':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",className:"nav-link",onClick:closeMenu,children:"Inicio"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#services",className:"nav-link",onClick:closeMenu,children:"Servicios"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#about",className:"nav-link",onClick:closeMenu,children:"Acerca de"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#contact",className:"nav-link",onClick:closeMenu,children:"Contacto"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"mobile-menu-btn ".concat(isMenuOpen?'active':''),onClick:toggleMenu,"aria-label":"Toggle menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{})]})]})});};export default Header;
